body: C++ question: does this reassign the reference `result1` to the output of `A.t().clone()` or does this "copy" `A.t().clone()` into `result1`?
body_html: C++ question: does this reassign the reference result1 to the output of A.t().clone() or does this "copy" A.t().clone() into result1?
